review: Easy to set up. Works flawlessly. Did extensive research, and this box suits our needs the best. Plus we are in the Amazon universe with Prime, HDX, and other Fires, which made the selection easier. Voice search is great. Really works, as they say. Would like it to search other apps like Netflix, etc. though.
author: dpvid

review: The Interface is Great. Very easy to use. Audio Search is easy & intuitive. The Remote is Very Good. The extra Features, such as the Blue tooth & the USB port are Great. Many Free  games &  if U'r a Casual App. style gamer, They are Good.  However, The Device Falls Short where All these Web based TV Boxes do. Thats in the Lack of a Web Browser ! Without a Browser; ( access to WWW.)  it's just a TV !  Come on, Give us a Browser without Censorship or Watch Doging ! Also, Fewer Channels than Other Boxes. Some  channels  Like "Vimeo" have noticeably less features than the Same Channels on Other Boxes ?  Amazon, Don't let the Lack of Internet access or Relevant Software Kill an otherwise Great Platform !
author: P. Killen
